title_en: Dominated balanced separators in wheel-induced-minor-free graphs
title_zh: 排除轮图诱导子式的图中受控平衡分离器的存在性
summary_en: Gartland and Lokshtanov conjectured that every graph that excludes some planar graph as an induced minor has a balanced separator, that is, a separator whose deletion leaves every component with no more than half of the vertices of the graph, which is dominated by a bounded number of vertices. We confirm this conjecture for excluding any fixed wheel, that is, a cycle together with a universal vertex, as an induced minor.
summary_zh: Gartland与Lokshtanov曾提出猜想：任何排除某一平面图作为诱导子式的图，均存在一个平衡分离器——即删除该分离器后，每个连通分量包含的顶点数不超过原图顶点数的一半，且该分离器受有限个顶点支配。我们证实了该猜想对于排除任意固定轮图（即一个环与一个全局顶点构成的图）作为诱导子式的情形成立。
